title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 201/88 of 25 January 1988 amending Regulation (EEC) No 1727/70 on intervention procedure for raw tobacco
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 201/88
of 25 January 1988
amending Regulation (EEC) No 1727/70 on intervention procedure for raw tobacco
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In the last line of Annex IV to Regulation (EEC) No 1727/70, '20' is replaced by '22'.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 25 January 1988.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 94, 28. 4. 1970, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 184, 3. 7. 1987, p. 30.
(3) OJ No L 191, 27. 8. 1970, p. 5.
(4) OJ No L 187, 9. 7. 1986, p. 9.
